accountposts.passifiedby: Possible id of an other record which has nullified this record. If not nullified, the value is 0.
accountposts.postsource: Name of the function which has generated this record
accountposts.posttypeid: Name or id of the user who has created this post
accountposts.price: Catalogue price based on the period and the number of persons.
accountposts.usedrate:
The used rate is the currency exchange rate between owner account and customer's preferred currency.
If the customer preferrers to pay in Euro and the owner account is in DKK, this rate will be around 7.45.

Author: Author
Base price for the period. You may let t: Base price for the period. You may let the total price depend on the number of guest. If so, the base price is for 1 up to the 'Including number of persons' number of guests.
batchtask.addposttypeid: Tick off if you want to add a record of the specified type after the batch task has been run.
batchtask.batchfunctionid: The description of the action which takes place when this batch task is run.
batchtask.dontfireifposttypeid: Tick off if you do not want to fire off this task if there is an account record of the specified type present. This action is useful to avoid that the same message is sent twice.
batchtask.emailid: The name of the e-mail which this batch task may submit.
batchtask.houseid: The name of the house which this batch task is bound to.
batchtask.mailto: Tick off the types of users who should be on the mailing list for this task.
batchtask.ownerid: Owner of the house which this batch task is bound to.
batchtask.paymentbelow: Tick off if you want to check the registrated payments. This figure should be written as a ratio of the full contract amount. If you want to check for missing payment, and you need 50% of the contract amount, write 0.50.
batchtask.posttypeid: This is the type of account record which has to be present to fire this task. Other conditions in the table below, must also be met.
batchtask.requiredposttypeid: Tick off, if you require another type of registration to be present. Select the type required.
batchtask.timedelayfrom: Tick off to fire off a certain number of days before the rental period starts. Using a negative number will make it fire off after the end of the rental period.
batchtask.timedelaystart: Tick off if you want to wait a number of days after the order date before this task is fired. Enter the number of days.
batchtask.translatedname: The description on the batch task.
Before the final order, you need to logi: Before the final order, you need to login. If you already have a login name and password, use that, If not, press 'New Customer' and register yourself.
Below, the content to be filled in is ex: Below, the content to be filled in is explained.
Blue days are not yet scheduled for rent: Blue days are not yet scheduled for rental, but you are welcome to make an equiry.
Browser not compatible: Your are using an old browser. You may consider to update to the current version.
carrental: You may advise your customer to use a specific car rental agency. You may possibly have a commission deal with it. Or you may may just explain where to find the agencies in the airport.

conditions: Here you need to formulate the rental terms. They should include payment and cancellation rules as well as special rules for using the house. They should spell out what is included and what is not included in the lease. And they should include checkin- and checkout times. You may choose to let one of the languages be the legally binding language.
contract.currencyid: Invoiced currency as preferred by the customer.
contract.departuredatetime: Departure time for the flight. This information is needed to help the cleaning personnel planning their day.
contract.discount: Enter discount as percent. After update, the final price will be discounted.
contract.finalprice: Price after a possible discount. You may change the price and the discount will be calculated.
contract.landingdatetime: Landing time for the flight. This information is needed to help the cleaning personnel planning their day.
contract.message: Message to the owner regarding this lease.
contract.persons: Number of persons using the property
contractlines.delete: You may delete periods if yoy need to reduce the length of the lease. At least one period must be left. To delete a period, tick off the periods to be removed and press the button: 'Delete period'.
contractlines.periodid: Shows the first period in the lease. To add a new period: select the period here and press the Add period button.
Copy workflow from standard template. By: Copy workflow from standard template. By pressing the button, you create a set of standard e-mails which are sent automatically at various conditions. The conditions are set in the batch task, which you can edit to your own needs. The E-mails exist in Danish and English languages. When done in one language, copy it to the other languages and translate.
Create or edit the basic information abo: Create or edit the basic information about the property. Use the button in the bottom of the table to create or edit the detailed textual and presentation information about the property.
Create the rental periods: the seasons,: Create the rental periods: the seasons, the prices, the length of each period, etc.
create_prices: Create the rental periods: the seasons, the prices, the length of each period, etc.
createperiod.basepersons: If you want the price structure to be dependent on the number of persons, this value should be filled in with the number of persons covered in the base price.
createperiod.baseprice: The price for the lease for up to the base persons.
createperiod.maxpersons: The max number of persons allowed in the lease. This figure may change over the season.
createperiod.personprice: The price for up to the max persons. If the person price is set to 0, this is the price for any number of persons.
createperiod.seasonend: The fields below must be updated with the last day in the season.
createperiod.seasonstart: The fields below must be updated with the first day in the season.
createperiods.explaintext: In this form you can create rental periods. The periods are grouped in seasons, and within a season you determine the price structure. First, select the house and fill in the number of seasons you want to create. Then press 'Prepare'
createperiods.fillintext: Please fill in the six fields for each season.

For each house, certain rules exist. The: For each house, certain rules exist. These are expressed in so-called batch tasks. When a new house has been added to the system, you should create batch tasks for this house. This form allows you to copy a set of standard batch tasks for your house. To do so, press 'Copy batch tasks'.

For each house, certain rules exist. These are expressed in so-called batch tasks. When a new house has been added to the system, you should create batch tasks for this house. This form allows you to copy a set of standard batch tasks for your house. To do so, press 'Copy batch tasks'.

gdpr: If you have rented our house, we keep your personal information for 6 years after the last booking. If you have no booking, we deleted the information after 1 year, and you can at any time before that period delete your account. The information stores is available under "My account".

house.address2: Possible location information in addition to the zip and town below.
house.currencyid: The currency used for the house. The price in the periods will be based on this currency.
house.dishwasher: Tick off if there is a dishwasher available for the guests.
house.disttobeach: Distance in meters to beach or place to swim in the sea.
house.fireplace: Tick off if there is a fireplace in the property.
house.internet: Tickoff if an internet connection is available for the guests.
house.latitude: You may not know the latitude of the property. But you can use the map below to find it. You can move and zoom until you find the location. When found, move the marker to the right posistion, and the coordinates will be transferred to these fields.
house.lockbatch: If this value is not empty or 0, the automatic work flow processes will not run for this property.
house.longitude: Use the map below. Zoom into the area, find the house and move the marker to the right position.
house.maidid: Tick off the persons who service the property. If no names are listed, you may add personell under the main menu: Setup
house.maxpersons: The maximum number of persons allowed to sleep in the property. You may adjust this figure in the setup of the rental periods.
house.name: Name of the house or property.
house.ownerid: This field is locked to the actual owner of the house.
house.pets: Tick off if pets are allowed.
house.pool: Tick off if the is a pool available for the guests.
house.prepayment: Possible standard requirement for payment at the order time. The batch process may also include such a figure. The figure is written as percentage: If the requirement is 1/3 of the contract amount, write 33.33 %.
house.sauna: Tick off if there is a sauna available for the guests.
house.spa: Tick off if the is a spa available for the guests.
house.viewfilter: The viewfilter is used to hide a house for end-users. This allows the house to be present in the database without displaying it to everyone. All transactions are thus kept.
house.washingmachine: Tick off if there is a washingmachine available for the guests.
house.www: The main home page for this property.
housei18n.description: This is the fully description of the property. Give a good description of the house ad add some nice pictures. Use the editor. If you find the editor too small, find the full screen button and expand to the full screen.
housei18n.route: The description of the route from the 'primary entry point', normally the airport or port, to the property. If you leave it empty, the associated menu point will not be shown.
housei18n.shortdescription: The short description is used on sites with many houses. The system shows a slide show of all the houses on the system, and it is the short description shown here.

merge.customer.explain: You may need to use this page, if a customer exists in many different versions in the system. This happens when a customer forgets about the login details and re-register as a new customer. With this function you can merge the customer activity from the old versions to the new version. The data will be kept, but the old version of the customer will be deleted.

The price for up to the max persons. If: The price for up to the max persons. If the person price is set to 0, this is the price for any number of persons.
The property name this mail is bound to.
The setup also gives access to the datab: The setup also gives access to the database allowing the edit of customers and other tables which is normally restricted in one way or the other.
The setup functions are used for setting: The setup functions are used for setting up common elements for the site such as the text of e-mail, conditions triggering e-mails, rights etc. etc.
The setup functions are used for setting up common elements for the site such as the text of e-mail, conditions triggering e-mails, rights etc. etc.
The setup functions: 'Batch tasks' and ': The setup functions: 'Batch tasks' and 'Std. e-mail' are used to setup the automatic e-mail functions.
The setup functions: 'Batch tasks' and 'Std. e-mail' are used to setup the automatic e-mail functions.
The short description is used on sites w: The short description is used on sites with many houses. The system shows a slide show of all the houses on the system, and it is the short description shown here.
The street name is on the house: The street name is on the house
The supervisor always has all rights.
The table also includes some other infor: The table also includes some other information related to the house.
The used rate is the currency exchange r:
The used rate is the currency exchange rate between owner account and customer's preferred currency.
If the customer preferrers to pay in Euro and the owner account is in DKK, this rate will be around 7.45.
The very short description is what pops: The very short description is what pops up when users pres the markers in the Google Maps. Remember to translate.
The viewfilter is used to hide a house f: The viewfilter is used to hide a house for end-users. This allows the house to be present in the database without displaying it to everyone. All transactions are thus kept.
The year this period belongs to.
There are no account posts to show.
There are no contracts to show.
This field is locked to the actual owner: This field is locked to the actual owner of the house.
This information includes the basis info: This information includes the basis information about your house: Name, address, coordinates, distance to beach, whether pets are allowed and the facilities present.
This information shows up as a result af: This information shows up as a result af a search. It may well consist of an extract of the description. Remember to translate to the languages chosen.
This is a DEMO system, no mails will be: This is a DEMO system, no mails will be sent!
This is a TEST system, no mails will be: This is a DEMO system, no mails will be sent!
This is a testsystem for demo only. No m: This is a testsystem for demo only. No mails will be sent.
This is the fully description of the pro: This is the fully description of the property. Give a good description of the house ad add some nice pictures. Use the editor. If you find the editor too small, find the full screen button and expand to the full screen.
This is the number of persons included i: This is the number of persons included in the base price. Set to 0 if the price does not depend on the number of persons.
This is the type of account record which: This is the type of account record which has to be present to fire this task. Other conditions in the table below, must also be met.
This the real production system - for te: This the real production system - for test purposes. Mails may be sent.
This the real productionssystem - for te: This the real production system - for test purposes. Mails may be sent.
Tick if you want to make balance zero: Tick if you want to make balance zero
Tick off if pets are allowed.
Tick off if the is a pool available for: Tick off if the is a pool available for the guests.
Tick off if the is a spa available for t: Tick off if the is a spa available for the guests.
Tick off if there is a dishwasher availa: Tick off if there is a dishwasher available for the guests.
Tick off if there is a fireplace in the: Tick off if there is a fireplace in the property.
Tick off if there is a sauna available f: Tick off if there is a sauna available for the guests.
Tick off if there is a washingmachine av: Tick off if there is a washingmachine available for the guests.
Tick off if you do not want to fire off: Tick off if you do not want to fire off this task if there is an account record of the specified type present. This action is useful to avoid that the same message is sent twice.
Tick off if you want to add a record of: Tick off if you want to add a record of the specified type after the batch task has been run.
Tick off if you want to check the regist: Tick off if you want to check the registrated payments. This figure should be written as a ratio of the full contract amount. If you want to check for missing payment, and you need 50% of the contract amount, write 0.50.
Tick off if you want to wait a number of: Tick off if you want to wait a number of days after the order date before this task is fired. Enter the number of days.
Tick off the persons who service the pro: Tick off the persons who service the property. If no names are listed, you may add personell under the main menu: Setup
Tick off the types of users who should b: Tick off the types of users who should be on the mailing list for this task.
Tick off the weeks you want and press 'S: Tick off the weeks you want and press 'Save'.
Tick off the weeks you want, enter the n: Tick off the weeks you want, enter the number of persons and press 'Next'.
Tick off to fire off a certain number of: Tick off to fire off a certain number of days before the rental period starts. Using a negative number will make it fire off after the end of the rental period.
Tick off, if you require another type of: Tick off, if you require another type of registration to be present. Select the type required.
Tickoff if an internet connection is ava: Tickoff if an internet connection is available for the guests.
To limit, choose the lease here: You may choose a specific lease
To order follow the two steps!: To order follow the two steps!

We offer support to house owners. To get: We offer support to house owners. To get support, call +45 45 16 1001, and the click link below to start a program which allows us to see what you see.
Weeknumber of the start of the period.
When you have cheked the price, press 'N: When you have cheked the price, press 'Next'
workflow: Copy workflow from standard template. By pressing the button, you create a set of standard e-mails which are sent automatically at various conditions. The conditions are set in the batch task, which you can edit to your own needs. The E-mails exist in Danish and English languages. When done in one language, copy it to the other languages and translate.
Yes, please, do allow automatically gene: Yes, please, do allow automatically generated account posts and mail
You do not have the rights for the attem: You do not have the rights for the attempted action
You do not say no to a nap: You do not say no to a nap
You have not logged in yet, press accept: You have not logged in yet, press accept and login as existing customer or register as new customer!
You have several properties, choose the: You have several properties, choose the one to work on:
You have waited too long time, please st: You have waited too long time, please start over!
You may advise your customer to use a sp: You may advise your customer to use a specific car rental agency. You may possibly have a commission deal with it. Or you may may just explain where to find the agencies in the airport.
You may also choose the currency to be u: You may also choose the currency to be used
You may choose a specific lease: You may choose a specific lease
You may choose not to book online. Or yo: You may choose not to book online. Or you may have special requirements, so feel free to contact the owner:
You may delete periods if yoy need to re: You may delete periods if yoy need to reduce the length of the lease. At least one period must be left. To delete a period, tick off the periods to be removed and press the button: 'Delete period'.
You may not know the latitude of the pro: You may not know the latitude of the property. But you can use the map below to find it. You can move and zoom until you find the location. When found, move the marker to the right posistion, and the coordinates will be transferred to these fields.
You may use a negative days to fire if a: You may use a negative days to fire if after the rental period
You may use a negative ratio to fire if: You may use a negative ratio to fire if greater than the numeric value
Your are using an old browser. You may c: Your are using an old browser. You may consider to update to the current version.
Your data have changed. Resubmit to save: Your data have changed. Resubmit to save.
